System Settings Help

Time and Timezone

Usual stuff here. Just remember to save the setting.

Software Update

Where there is a newer version of WebAdmin (this web app) and Monitor (the software between the WebAdmin and the reader network), UPGRADE button will be available.

Purge and Reboot

Serious stuff here! Doors won't open anymore, and things!

Reboot will require about 45 seconds before authentication service is available again.
